long_description: If you're looking for comfort, you'll find it in the Lookin Moderate bike saddle thanks to cushy gel and plush elastomers. RoyalGel adapts to your anatomy and reduces pressure points; does not age, harden, or migrate over time. Elastomers, as well as the RoyalGel, absorb shock for further comfort. Saddle cover is designed to stay cooler in the sun, helping keep your backside from getting scorched when you remount after an off-bike stroll or errand. The Lookin Moderate saddle shape encourages an almost upright riding position for comfort. Integrated clip system (ICS) allows for hassle-free attachment of a compatible saddle bag (not included).
short_description: If you're looking for comfort, you'll find it in the Lookin Moderate bike saddle thanks to cushy gel and plush elastomers.
